TopicTitle: [Video] 10 General Tips and Tricks for everyday use

Articles.Content:
This is an old video made in 0.23.5, but the tips should all work with 24.2.

This is my first ever recorded video so don't expect good video editing and quality. Enjoy

English isn't my first language (german)

the music is too hype for the boring video :]
Its a good video. Thanks for sharing!
Thanks. Good to know that it wasn't terrible

nice, thanks. never bothered to check out the action groups because i figured it would be a hassle to set them up. now i know it actually takes less time to set it up than to deploy a bunch of solar panels manually i'll defently experiment with that

nice editing too, even without sound (i'm at work) everything is perfectly clear. good one
